Text.Page:
On your knees and bow before me, wretched adventurer!

Excuse me, what? You're trying to offer me Tokens: Fire Demon's Power in exchange for Ancient Mighty Mounts? Why didn't you say that then?

Sorry for the frosty welcome and my gruff tone. I do that to deter thieves and crooks. Please, come closer and take a look at my wares.
